name: Whiplash - Crash Valley
description: Whiplash - Crash Valley. Super-premium-deluxe interactive Ragdoll simulation system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i3-2100 3.1GHz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 11 (AMD HD 6000 series GPU or equivalent) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Caution! Needs dedicated GPU to run, will NOT work on a CPU with integrated GPU!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i5-3570 3.4GHz Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: 2Gb DirectX 11 (AMD HD 7800 series GPU or equivalent) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Caution! Needs dedicated GPU to run, will NOT work on a CPU with integrated GPU!
